display_long_description:
Get ready for an intense VR experience where teamwork and fast reflexes make all the difference! In this multiplayer game, players are split into Red and Blue teams and face a series of unpredictable wall challenges. Before each game, a spinning wheel randomly selects the difficulty — from simple shapes to complex poses that require precision and quick thinking.

Your goal is to strike the correct pose before the wall hits — succeed and earn points for your team, fail and take a splash! With support for up to 10 players, each match is packed with laughs, chaos, and competitive energy.

Customization adds to the fun. Visit the in-game shop run by SAV to unlock cosmetics and stand out in the arena. You’ll earn 100 tokens daily just by logging in and playing, or grab extra tokens if you want to gear up faster.

Whether you’re here to compete or chill with friends, this game brings energy, creativity, and nonstop action to your VR headset. Jump in, pose up, and help your team claim the win!
